Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My teacher understands the course material and specifics on the requirements for my studies and assignments. AI is only for helping me rewrite my paragraphs to be more succint and concise.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI can be more frustrating as I have to refine my prompts as I go to get specifically what I need, however it is always available at my convenience. Being able to talk to a teacher who is knowledgeable makes me feel supported and secure when asking for clarity about subject material.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI cannot replicate teachers and their experience, human passion and expression is the most memorable and impactful way content can be received.
